PropertyValue.Value: select sta.station_cn_name, devType.device_name, t.device_id, bpti.para_desc, t.para_version, t.para_file_name, case t.para_version_type when '01' then '当前版本' when '02' then '将来版本' end para_version_type, t.active_date_time, t.update_date, t.update_time from para_dev_version_info t left join basi_station_info sta on sta.station_id = subStr(t.device_id, 1, 4) left join basi_dev_type_info devType on devType.device_type = subStr(t.device_id, 5, 2) left join basi_para_type_info bpti on bpti.para_type = t.para_type
